Work

Starting from 2012 I started to work on Geo-Consulting, work experience that I do paralleling university. In my "business trip" started in Geo-consulting I I could hone my knowledge of Java, aexpanding my horizons to the classic Java EE stack, Spring Framework and its ecosystem in which it currently can boast of working experience and not from 2013.
Staring from november of 2015 I had started to work in Sourcesense, company in which I'm having the opportunity of learn more about of the most important open source project/product like Spring Liferay, Alfresco WSO2 and so on. I Contribute also on StackOverflow sharing      my knowledge to groped to help solve problems of the comunity. I had also a github account in which I share some of my opensource projects.
